name: flickr.galleries.getPhotos
description: Return the list of photos for a gallery
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: gallery_id
arguments.description: The ID of the gallery of photos to return

arguments.name: continuation
arguments.description:
Using this parameter indicates to the server that the client is using the new, continuation based pagination rather than the older page/per_page based pagination.
The first request must pass the "continuation" parameter with the value of "0". The server responds back with a response that includes the "continuation" field along with the "per_page" field in the response. For the subsequent requests, the client must relay the value of the "continuation" response field as the value of the "continuation" request parameter. On the last page of results, the server will respond with a continuation value of "-1".

arguments.name: get_user_info
arguments.description: set to 1 if user details should be returned

arguments.name: get_gallery_info
arguments.description: if set to 1, info about the gallery is also returned

arguments.name: extras
arguments.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned record. Currently supported fields are:description,license,date_upload,date_taken,owner_name,icon_server,original_format,last_update,geo,tags,machine_tags,o_dims,views,media,path_alias,url_sq,url_t,url_s,url_q,url_m,url_n,url_z,url_c,url_l,url_o

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

response:
<photos page="1" pages="1" perpage="500" total="2">
  <photo id="2822546461" owner="78398753@N00" secret="2dbcdb589f" server="1" farm="1" title="FOO" ispublic="1" isfriend="0" isfamily="0" is_primary="1" has_comment="1">
    <comment>best cat picture ever!</comment>
  </photo>
  <photo id="2822544806" owner="78398753@N00" secret="bd93cbe917" server="1" farm="1" title="OOK" ispublic="1" isfriend="0" isfamily="0" is_primary="0" has_comment="0" />
</photos>

Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
